description: 3 prints: .1 - bald, gray bearded man kneeling and painting; paints and brushes around him;  .2 - bald man with glasses seated at low bench, working on wood cutting; other wood cutting tools on bench;  .3 - dark haired man seated on cushions at low desk; artist is pressing stone onto tablet to make impression (?); 3 images mounted next to each other
marks:

on tape at LL, typewritten: [ORLIK,
title: Maler, Holzschneider und Drucker in Japan
